about_the_game:
Point and click to search for clues and solve mysteries with one of Hollywood's most deranged private investigators, Suede.

A crooked patent clerk named Alan Maxwell stole a patent from your client’s husband. As far as you know, his office was located right on a corner block in Dunkin Heights. And not the good part. While Frankie, your partner, is busy tailing Maxwell and making sure he is out of the way, your job is to get into his office and find the patent. Unfortunately, the window to his office is just out of reach. And, you aren't exactly alone.

Be immersed into a cinematic experience with slapstick characters in this film noir comedy adventure. From High life to lowlifes, hobnob or interrogate to get big information about the big case. Collect items to help you solve puzzles. Help crack the case and restore Tinseltown back to normal, at last by Hollywood’s standards.

name: Frankie and Suede Private Detectives Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2-core 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 4-core 2.9 GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070, Radeon RX 5700 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Point and click to search for clues and solve mysteries with one of Hollywood's most deranged private investigators, Suede. While your partner, Frankie, is out tailing the suspect, you've got a job to do and a puzzles to solve. How do you get into his office without being seen?
